alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 15 at 7:50AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Harrison and Jackson Counties through 915 AM CDT... At 750 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Saucier to near Long Beach. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Ocean Springs, Long Beach, Moss Point, St. Martin, Escatawpa, Gautier, D`iberville, Wade, Latimer, Big Point, Lyman, Saucier, Helena, Gulf Hills, Hurley, Vancleave, Gulf Park Estates and Hickory Hills. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 22 and 76. Interstate 110 in Mississippi between mile markers 3 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
